data.name: Roto Force
data.detailed_description:
SUPPORTS KEYBOARD & MOUSE INPUT, BUT IS BEST PLAYED WITH A CONTROLLER.




Step into the shoes of the newest recruit of the Roto Force, and take on missions nobody else has the time for. Venture into dangerous deserts, joyful jungles, and slimy sewers, and make them a safer place.

Roto Force is a fast-paced game about fighting frantic bosses, while quickly dodging their attacks. Disregard gravity while walking on walls and jumping from one side of the room to another. The instant dash ability provides quick mobility, while various unlockable weapons provide unique ways of overcoming any foes.


What's in the game:

  • Unique spin on twin-stick shoot 'em' up gameplay
  • Simple controls (2 buttons + twin sticks)
  • A pumpin' Drum 'n' Bass Soundtrack
  • 9+ Stages
  • Unlock 9+ weapons that provide different playstyles
  • About 30 Mini-Bosses
  • About 10 regular sized Bosses
  • Short and to the point
  • Can be played through in an afternoon, or a weekend
  • Challenging Gameplay
  • Unlimited Lives and frequent checkpoints
  • Higher Difficulty Mode can be unlocked (if you really want)
  • Generous Accessibility Options

What's not in the game:

  • No story (also no reading required)
  • No scores, no procedural generation
  • No more than 4 colors at a time

A small game, made with love by a small team.

data.short_description: Shoot and dash your way through frantic missions to protect the Rotoverse. A twin-stick shooter set in a rotating world. Unlock weapons, move quickly and fight tons of bosses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7 or newer
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5 or newer
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 or similar
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
